Containers.Name: Processing
Containers.Overview:
This container moves and categorizes MP3/MKV/EPUB/PDF-Files from /downloads to subfolders of /processing
These are defined by Environment Variables (defaults should give you an idea):
$MKVTAG All MKV's Title/Video/Audio1/Audio2/Audio3-Tags are set to this $LANGUAGE 2-letter language code used for sorting Movies/Shows $MUSIC The subfolder MP3s are put into $EBOOKS The subfolder EPUBs are put into $MAGAZINES The subfolder PDFs are put into $SHOWS The subfolder MKVs of shows/anime are put into (with quality appended) $MOVIES The subfolder MKVs of movies are put into (with year of release appended) $DRONE MKVs in this subfolder of /downloads are Tagged, then Moved to its equivalent in /processing for Sonarr to pick up
The container runs headlessly and stops automatically.
Use with care! Only let it lose on your Files if you fully understand the consequences!
SRT/SUB/IDX/M3U/URL-Files are considered Clutter and will be deleted from /downloads
This container is based on smdion/docker-nginx/ and uses mkvtoolnix for Tagging/Filebot for sorting media
